Key Match Events: Milson netted a stoppage-time winner to snap Ghana's 24-year unbeaten record at the Baba Yara Sports Stadium
Post-Match Reflections: The defeat leaves Ghana at the bottom of the group while Angola takes the top spot
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch looked lush and green but its reaction to pressure was terrible
The fans became the talking point after the game, vandalizing the seats and the pitch-side boards in reaction to the unwanted result
Others: The Black Stars lack a target man
The Black Stars resorted to crossing at some point, but without the presence of a target man, Angola had no problems dealing with them
The Black Stars won the most corners and free-kicks in the game because they were dominant, but could not make any of them count
The fans invaded the pitch at one point during the game
